website_summaries.verdict: An clear light-up fidget spinner that requires no charging to operate.
pros: This fascinating model features a battery-powered set of LED lights that can switch between 6 operating modes
The auto-off feature ensures you won't drain the battery if you forget to shut the unit off after spinning
cons: Customers occasionally receive a model that doesn't light up properly
If that happens, the company reportedly has excellent customer service and will make amends

customer_reviews.title: Miss fireworks but don’t want the noise!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun!!! Each end of the circle has a button that turns on the lights and it was three different modes turned on, blinking, and slowing blinking.
customer_reviews.author: Verdantdude

customer_reviews.title: Great sensory toy, my son loves to watch it light up and spin
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my (almost) 3 year old. He won't put it down, this was immediately his favorite toy on Christmas, even though he got a schwinn tricycle lol kids. The only reason I gave this 4 stars is because one of the lights went out on the first day of playing with it. Otherwise, it's a great little sensory toy!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany k.

customer_reviews.title: Super cool for a gift
customer_reviews.text: We just got this yesterday for a stocking stuffer for my oldest and it’s awesome. I’ve had so much fun with it I may keep it haha. Just kidding but I love that there’s different light settings to try different patterns. It spins great to!! Perfect stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.author: Brittany W

customer_reviews.title: 4yr old LOVES!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really cool..never seen a fidget spinner like this. Our 4 yr old daughter loves loves loves this!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool and a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The price-point for this was perfect. I bought it for a christmas gift and I'm mesmerized by it. Feels sturdy and spins nicely. It doesn't feel cheap. There are three separate light buttons that each have multiple effects depending on how many times you click them and they all operate individually. Its pretty cool and I think my kid is gonna love it.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Spintastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: This figet spinner glides smooth and has 3 different light choices! Me and my daughter absolutely love it so much I might have to order another one!It came in a plastic carrying case which was a definite plus. The lights are turned on/off at each corner of the spinner. Overall, its more than worth the money for the quality of this figit spinner!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Mitchum

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea of the Spinner but also disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the concept of a fidget spinner that made different colors. But when I got it in the mail, only two lights work. Tried to figure out how to replace the battery but couldn’t find a way to. Disappointed in that but when it spins it still makes a pattern at least. (Tried to upload a video of it but couldn’t, I can send a video to show that the third one doesn’t work) Just disappointed that all three lights don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: One of the lights didn’t work until my daughter dropped the fidget spinner; it’s worked since. It’s pretty and my daughter uses it during endless Zoom calls with remote learning. I love it, too. I would get one for myself but $10 is too much in my opinion for a plastic “toy.”
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Fidget me spinner
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 5 year old and the colors are a blast. Not just your average fidget spinner. Multiple settings make for lots of options and lighting shows. Well made, feels good, looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Luvtogether

customer_reviews.title: Super cool spinner
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute. Bought this for my daughter ( who picked this out herself) and she loves it. It has a lot of different bright colors. It came in a plastic case holder which was cool. She really enjoys playing with it. Overall, this had been a great purchase. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R.C

customer_reviews.title: My son was very happy. All the lights are on and the good ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son, 7 years old. When the old spinner was cracked he needed a new spinner with light. My son was very happy. All the lights are on and the good shape is coming out. It's been over 2 weeks. There's nothing wrong with that.
customer_reviews.author: murat

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a child... even an adult would try to steal a spins 😂😂😂
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves it!!! It has so many settings to choose from to give him several options to change the lighting on the spinner. The durability is great too because he’s dropped it a few times and it didn’t break or chip. It’s a colorful way to distract him from his iPad when it needs to charge lol worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: What more could you ask? It is very durable looking and heavy duty. Each leg has its own battery and lights for millions of combinations of patters when spinning. Should last longer than the child's interest in it. Very cheap for the return on investment. I'd recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BunMaanus

customer_reviews.title: Lights were out on one side
customer_reviews.text: One of the sides didn’t light up when I received it. Since it was a gift from “Santa” I couldn’t return it. It would have been a cool gift if all the sides lit up. Luckily my son didn’t mind because he wanted one so badly.
customer_reviews.author: Shyne

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good fidget spinner, just one issue. Don't put it in water it gets rusty. My kid threw it in water and it got rusty, i have to put few drops of oil to get it work but it feels heavy to spin now. Otherwise good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Njaved

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun! I bought this to attach to a “busy board” for my toddler. He can’t quite spin it yet, but he likes pressing the buttons to control the lights. All the adults in the house though have been having fun spinning it! Lots of cool light patterns. Overall a fun little toy.
customer_reviews.author: JennMMtex

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago and it still works like new. It can be used as a fun game! On each of the three sides I taped one picture or question symbol so when my students spun it they would have to answer/ask a question. So much fun! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Boring for adults.
customer_reviews.text: I quit smoking and needed something to do with my hands. My daughter suggested a fidget spinner. Does do the trick for me. It’s boring. Maybe crochet or knitting might be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Spins great, heavier duty and quality buttons push perfectly for cool colors.
customer_reviews.text: Top of the Christmas stocking my girl loved this one, she has others, however, this one lights up and changes, where she is spinning it all the time. She is very happy with the cool Santa gift.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kissick

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite of the LED spinners!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite LED spinners! And I have lots of them to compare!! Plastic is kinda cheapish but for the price who cares! The way the LED lights change patterns while spinning is mesmerizing and addicting. I like the way you can set each wing to different colors/patterns and depending how you set them the pattern continually changes too. Truly difficult to put down.
customer_reviews.author: angiegereTop Contributor: Star Trek

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a captivating toy for adults and children. Gave me hours of fun with my grandson. The light array has multiple settings and produces a variety of patterns while spinning. Excellent gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Kannan R.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this, however it does seem to come apart a lot and not necessarily the easiest to get back together but when it does work he enjoys it as well as mom and dad
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my niece but I’m keeping it for myself! It’s so much fun playing with this after having a stressful day. I will order another one for her!
customer_reviews.author: Christine  d

customer_reviews.title: A good gift; works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these LED spinners, both for myself and a 4 year old nephew. I'm fully satisfied with the product, and my nephew seems to like his spinner too. The lights are bright and colorful, and different spinning light patterns make the toy mesmerizing to play with. Therapeutic for those with ADHD, OCD, anxiety, and autism spectrum conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t light up
customer_reviews.text: Really upsetting to my daughter to open this yesterday on Christmas just to find out it doesn’t even work. She was very sad and this was the main thing she asked for. I should have just went to Walmart for a regular one. I will be returning this item ****Update***** because this did not with any paperwork, besides a plastic bag, I didn’t realize there were buttons that you had to push. My daughter figured it out and I’m glad she likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Shawny King

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool but too expensive for something that’s basically a junk toy.
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive. The lights don’t stay on. But I have heard that we focus better when our hands are occupied. So I bought it for that. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t broken yet. My 5 yo has had it for a week and it’s still working...lights are brights and have 3 settings on each end. Very cool for the kids. And adults too tbh.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Villar

customer_reviews.title: Nice spinner
customer_reviews.text: You get what you see , it comes in a nice little clear carrying case. Took me a second to figure out how to make the lights come on to make sure they worked (press buttons) But other than that it was great. Great stocking stuffer for my child.
customer_reviews.author: Sb

customer_reviews.title: Great for fidgeting with for a few days
customer_reviews.text: Son played with it for 3 days non-stop and then forgot about it. Maybe because they cancelled school? He liked it tho. It lights up
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Great novelty gift to kill time🌅
customer_reviews.text: Are use this spinner toy to help me reduce blood pressure in traffic jams and also used for waiting in doctors offices.
customer_reviews.author: dajfed2038

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Item was given as Christmas gift stocking stuffer. Child plays with it and has great time watching the color change.
customer_reviews.author: M. Breed

customer_reviews.title: Best fidget spinner
customer_reviews.text: This fidget spinner is exactly what I was hoping for when I set out to find a glowing fidget spinner on Amazon. It has four different light modes, rapid flashing, pulse, fast fade, and slow fade. It's great for down time at work when I am bored and just staring at my computer screen.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: One side did not work upon receiving it
customer_reviews.text: One side did not light up upon receiving and opening the package. I had a very disappointed four-year-old. Then, he dropped it on the tile floor once and one of the sides that you push to activate the light up feature cracked and broke off completely with one drop. This is definitely a junk fidget spinner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get one at the dollar store-this is nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing like the picture👎🏻 Ordered the crystal one which looks colorful in the picture. It is just clear plastic, no color. Comes in a nice case, but quality of spinner is questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a light up one but I got your normal fidget spinner- my kid didn’t care but if I’m going to spend money on something in general I expect it to be what it says in the description!
customer_reviews.author: vlara711

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money they don’t last!
customer_reviews.text: They literally worked good for 20 minutes and then both were broken. Ended up returning back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Caught the eye of grandson.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for ten year old grandson for Christmas. He absolutely loves it. He says it’s fancy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Good spinner
customer_reviews.text: first time it was faulty. The seller sold me another one for 7 cents (even though they said free) no biggie.The new one is awesome. Thanks for fixing the problem. Every thing works great.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: product too cheap to last
customer_reviews.text: Broke in like 3 days. It started opening from the battery side.threw it out
customer_reviews.author: miss kim

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Lights up very well and fun to watch. Yes an adult gets entranced by it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R. Cripps

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in my hands immediately. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, it literally falls apart within seconds, yes seconds. There's nothing holding it together.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Vance

customer_reviews.title: Nice spinner
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice spinner that has lasted over a year. Works great
customer_reviews.author: FOS123

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first day
customer_reviews.text: This fidget spinner was really cool, my son liked the multiple settings. But it broke the day he got it. One of the arms stopped lighting, the button no longer depresses. It should last more than a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L.

customer_reviews.title: Lights don't work!
customer_reviews.text: The flashing lights didn't work. Wasted money. It cost almost as much to return it as the spinner cost. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dead batteries
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as stocking stuffer for granddaughter... arrived just before Christmas... Did not work... I guess batteries were dead... too late for exchange... she got it as is... so disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: frank raffa

customer_reviews.title: Cool spinner
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my ten year old nephew and he loves it. The colors are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Spin does not last for more than even 20 seconds whatever force you apply. Cheap quality material plastic almost broken in a small press. No finishing, sharp edges out, Not as per description. Noisy, Only 4 light option not 6. Very disappointed I am going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nanak Biswas

customer_reviews.title: Spinner
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the Quality of this product only one set of lights worked and the spinner was beginning to warp and come apart I would not recommend anyone buying this .
customer_reviews.author: michael l. fitzhenry

customer_reviews.title: Appealing but lacks in quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchase 2 of these for my 6 and 10 year old boys. My 6 year old broke his on the first day after it fell once. All the pieces shattered and I was unable to put it back together. My 10 year dropped his on day 3 and same thing. I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Lights nice spinning could be better
customer_reviews.text: Nice lights 3 modes however spinning on this could be better
customer_reviews.author: Lardog 0911

customer_reviews.title: Lights dont last
customer_reviews.text: It worked for half a day. All the batteries burned out. My 6 year old is very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Item wasn’t working when received but they worked with me and we worked it out
customer_reviews.author: kim morris

customer_reviews.title: I like this finger toy very much
customer_reviews.text: I like this finger toy very much. I think this is a stress relief toy that can relax people. I often carry it with me. I like watching it spin quietly and quickly, and its colorful lighting effects are also great. There is a hidden function to amuse children, every child seems to be interested in it
customer_reviews.author: Travis James

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh?!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat but, cheaply made. Bought two so each of my little ones could have one. One set of LED'S on one of the spinners does not work. Returning it and pretty much have to buy another one so they both have one. Kind of hesitant because now that I've seen it in person and held it, I really don't think it is worth $7. Maybe half that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fidget spinner I’ve see thus far
customer_reviews.text: We have about 10 spinners in total but this one is the best. My 4 year old collects them. This one has a long spin time and lots of light patterns. Cool both in light and in the dark. I’m so glad I got this spinner for him. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Rocked his world
customer_reviews.text: Part of a Christmas gift for a 6 year-old. It lit up and spun smooth, it rocked his world. Off all the spinners he got that night, this was the one he never put down.
customer_reviews.author: In Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Is pretty my daughter liked it but once the lights started ...
customer_reviews.text: in 2 weeks the some of the lights already stopped working. Is pretty my daughter liked it but once the lights started going away is just a transparent fidget
customer_reviews.author: Sonny O. Zamot

customer_reviews.title: Great gift !
customer_reviews.text: Son loved this so much , he got it march and still uses it today lights and all !!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Godinez

customer_reviews.title: Broken after two days
customer_reviews.text: After two days of light use the center of the spinner came apart. My son was very disappointed, being it was a gift for having good grades in school. Sadly we had to throw it away because the center was not able to be fixed because all the little ball bearings fell out and couldn’t be placed back in.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Soileau

customer_reviews.title: Very cool spinner!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Spins great and with the different color/blinking features, creates some very cool patterns when spinning. Not sure how long the batteries will last but so far a great spinner!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Received the item broken, but the item is quirky
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool gimmick, and to be fair I had some fun with it for a little while. However, I received the product with broken parts. One of the three prongs had broken lights, and there was some sort of a grinding noise that made the spinner stop spinning a lot faster.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids 4 and 15 love this neat spinner it lights up and keeps their attention.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Checked the listing and reviews, watched the videos.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: ... as a Christmas present and was excited about the good reviews. I know the item's price has been ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a Christmas present and was excited about the good reviews. I know the item's price has been as low as $2.50. I wanted it so bad that I payed 4 times that. When I got it, two out of three lights weren't working. I just want a new one to be able to give it away, but now it may be too late. I don't want to have to pay 10 dollars for it, I feel like it's quality is not even worth $3.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Sabino-Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Colors are pretty when spinning and it spins very freely
customer_reviews.text: Fogrol Fidget Spinner itself is ok. Colors are pretty when spinning and it spins very freely. However within a couple weeks of purchase the pivot points on two of the three buttons to turn the lights on and off broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked out in the end
customer_reviews.text: After initial difficulty of fidget breaking, the company quickly contacted me and sent a replacement immediately. It works great and kids are happy.
customer_reviews.author: S Steinman

customer_reviews.title: Better than other LED spinners
customer_reviews.text: Spin times aren't great but it performs better than other LED spinners. It's noisy though, so you won't want to use it in places where noise levels are an issue.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Super fun toys!
customer_reviews.text: These fidget spinners are super fun. My 12 year old loves these and so does my 3 year old. My youngest has to be supervised while playing with these to avoid any accidents, however even I have fun watching the cool patterns the spinning lights create.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with half the lights already not working. All the lights burnt out within a month. We got an appropriate amount of fun out of them though.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Neat spinner
customer_reviews.text: Nice spinner. Has click button on each end to turn 4 different modes of light! Cool, kid loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good spinner bearing
customer_reviews.text: Good spinner bearing, the lights have clickable buttons on the face of the spinner and they are easily worn out or stop working in general, You can not replace the batteries so when they die you will just have to go without.
customer_reviews.author: outdoorMTfunman

customer_reviews.title: A great gift - stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. The kids are obsessed with the different light functions.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kelly Gannon - The Gannon Edit

customer_reviews.title: Not 100%
customer_reviews.text: One of the points' led has a setting that no longer lights up. It quit working in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth PartakerTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with fidget spinners. She had one but broke it when she dropped it. This one seems much more durable. It lights up at different speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had to have this. She loves it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: jlee xO

customer_reviews.title: Spinner
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his spinner, he got one because his brother got one.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson who collects them and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Asto

customer_reviews.title: Lights stopped working the first day.
customer_reviews.text: The lights stopped working the first day which was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a plastic like case too!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what warmth means but I gave it a 5 anyways. My son is almost 8 and absolutely loves this! "This is so sick!" -his lingo 😄
customer_reviews.author: Black family

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: My grandson love gadget. He could wait to get it and never stop playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: partricia chavis

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old love it. Lights are bright and change while spinning. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt light up
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter and the lights dont work. She barely even used it. Beyond upset.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Item did not work but company reached out and offered refund very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good fidget spinner
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good fidget spinner. The only downside is that it makes quite a bit of noise and the parts seem a little loose. Otherwise, everything about it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Got mine in today told my kid how it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Got mine in today told my kid how it was gonna light up.. Got it out of the package.. it doesn't light up! After some frustration we figured it out. I'll change my rating now .
customer_reviews.author: Shay miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. One of the three lights would not turn on. I exchanged it and the replacement had a light that wouldn't turn off.
customer_reviews.author: GBell

customer_reviews.title: Cool lights!!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 7 year old grandson. He said it’s his favorite spinner. The lights are so cool
customer_reviews.author: Gina Dawsey

customer_reviews.title: Really cheap. One day toy
customer_reviews.text: Last 2 days max. Opened up and batteries came out. Lights immediately stopped working and could not be fixed or replaced..
customer_reviews.author: Nalda

customer_reviews.title: You Spin Me Right Round Baby
customer_reviews.text: Good fidget spinner. I like the lights. Seems to be decent construction.
customer_reviews.author: NewfMom

customer_reviews.title: Worked less than a day
customer_reviews.text: Very cool if it had stayed working, but 2 of the three legs refused to light up on day two.
customer_reviews.author: Denise DC

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it was still functioning, but the buttons break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L.

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Case arrived cracked. 2 of the arms did not light up at all. Very disappointed. Terrible product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Chang

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. No replacement option available. I was really excited to give this to my boyfriend's son. I'm dissapointed I waited for no reason. Refund only available if I ship it back in and for a piece of plastic its just not worth it. Buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice fidget spinner.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these. Heck, I love them. Nice colors and sparkle, they have buttons to turn off the colors on each piece.
customer_reviews.author: Do-It-Yourself Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Sent an empty case!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and loved it - bought a second as a gift and they shipped me an empty plastic container!
customer_reviews.author: Erethel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My Dad has alzheimers and he plays with it all the time. It's a little Happy in a sad environment. He's so precious...it breaks my heart.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi W.

customer_reviews.title: My cats do not even like it.
customer_reviews.text: One light did not work on it when got it. Cheap. My cats do not even like it.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Good thing the child was easy going
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for Christmas gifts. One has one burnt out led light. Good thing the child was easy going! But still disappointing. They are awesome when they work!
customer_reviews.author: Toma

customer_reviews.title: RipOFF— Sent an EMPTY PACKAGE!!
customer_reviews.text: THERE WAS NOTHING IN THE PACKAGE!!!! A clear circular EMPTY box. WORST PRODUCT EVER.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: First LED Fidget Spinner we have had that actually WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Great little Fidget Spinner. After several months, it actually still works. My kids really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

product_meta.title: FIGROL Fidget Spinner, Clear Fidget Toy, Crystal Led Light Rainbow Toy Finger Hand Spinner-Kids(Crystal)
feature_bullets: ☛Notice ☚FIGROL-Direct is committed to providing each customer with the highest standard of customer service. If you have any product problem concerned,please don't hesitate to contact us as soon as possible. It's our great honor to serve for you.☞ 3 colors(Red Blue Green) and different shining models.Press again to change the modes.

【SMALL ENOUGH TO USE ANYWHERE】At the office, commuting, in class, studying, in a meeting or watching TV. Simply keep one in your purse, pocket, car, or desk drawer and know that you always have this simple device with you
【Safety】 ABS Material can Provided with Shocking High Quality when Drop Spinner off Uncarefully,Besides,Produced Under Strict Supervision that meets new US Toy Safety Standard (ASTM F963-16)
